data.text: I bike with my cat sometimes. Its best to keep them in a front basket. There are several bicycle basket that are made for cat and small dogs. You cud also use a backpack carrier. (Backpacks are better for winter) It will take a while for your cat to get used to riding on your bike. Try taking your cat for a ride and see how they do. (Go slow or walk your bike) If they meow a lot, you should try petting or talking to your cat. Because of the heat, you might want to put a ice pack with your cat, to keep them cool. Keep them on a harness and leash at all times, because they cud get scared and run off. (Can unleash them if you have a tent or a enclosed play pen for them) Some cats love it, and it can be a geat bonding experience for the two of you. do some extra research on bicycle riding with a cat. (A lot of people ride with there cats and you will find a lot of useful information. How old is your cat? How long is your trip?
